paper_abstract: We present a pure combinatorial problem whose solution determines max-flow min-cut ratio for directed multicommodity flows. In addition, this combinatorial problem has applications in improving the approximation factor of the greedy algorithm for the maximum edge disjoint path problem. More precisely, our upper bound improves the approximation factor for this problem to O(n(3/4)). (c) 2005 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: On the max-flow min-cut ratio for directed multicommodity flows
